Title: BL: Los Angeles
Plot:
While in LA, Alan takes on the case of TV star Courtney Rae, who is arrested after shooting a photographer who she mistakes for a stalker.  But Denny and Barry make life difficult when they won't stop making sexual advances toward their client.

Meanwhile, Denise resorts to underhanded tactics to eliminate Marlene from the picture, but the plan backfires when she is caught by Paul.  And Brad enlists Shirley's help in trying to persuade the judge in his niece's trial to lower the sentence.
GuestStars: Rebecca Lin,  Robert Wagner,  Jeri Ryan,  Parker Posey,  Jere Burns,  Steve Valentine,  Ana Ortiz,  Robin Riker,  William C. Mitchell,  Robert Foxworth,  Emily Montague,  Lindsay Frost,  Marty Lodge,  Sean Blodge
